comment: Professor Qu is a super sweet lady. She cares about her students! It can be difficult to understand sometimes due to her accent so I recommend sitting close. She is very clear about grading. Attendance is important to get points toward your grade. Once all the points you need are earned you no longer have to attend. Test half in person half online.

Dr. Qu is one of the best teachers at Kennesaw State, period. She is extremely caring and wants every single one of her students to do well. She has an accent but as long as you sit close to the front it is not as issue. Very very smart and will always be able to answer a question you have while making the subject matter easier to understand

I am sitting in this class while typing. She is a very caring professor who is willing to help. She has an accent  but if you pay attention you can understand. If you actually care i would sit in front row and ask questions when you have them. she understands what it means to be slammed with work and can help you out. Great professor. TAKE HER!!!!!

Very kind. Makes sure you know exactly what is on the tests and she allows a half page of notes on each test.  She can be a little quiet in lecture but offers more points than you need so your grade should be solid.
Attendance 1%
In-Class Work 14%
Kahoot 5%
Exams (4) are 12% each
Group Project 5%
Quizzes 12%
Tableau 2%
SB 5%
HW 5%
Video 3%

Professor Qu provides so many extra credit opportunities -- it is hard not to pass her class. If you attend class regularly and turn assignments in on time, you will do well. She is a great professor, I would recommend her to anyone who wants a good understanding of accounting.

A lot of (easy) homework! Very sweet professor who is there to help if you just reach out. Gives extra credit, notes and book allowed for quizzes but not the exams. I've failed accounting with a different professor, but passed with a high A this time, and a lot of that is because of how organized this professor's class is. DEFINITELY recommend her!

Prof. Qu is a very caring and overall good professor. It may be hard to understand her accent at first, but it grows on you. She grades out of 1000 points and gives lots of extra credit. There is a lot of homework and a Kahoot every now and then. She allows notes on her exams and walks through problems with you in class. Great professor, 10/10!

She is the sweetest lady ever who wants to see her students succeed. She does have a heavy load of homework though but is willing to help you before or outside of class. Responds to emails very quick! Pushes deadlines to help align with other classes for her students. She understands that we have other classes as well. Take her for accounting!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Hong means well but was constantly oversharing personal information and seemed to be teaching herself how to teach the course material as she was teaching it to us. I often found myself more confused about the material after attending class than before. Easy A class but you will have to teach yourself.

It was her 1st semester teaching ACCT4050, but she did a good job. She takes into account all feedback she gets, so make sure you tell her suggestions. She truly cares. The content was very difficult, but she teaches it well. She offers extra credit where she can, which helped my grade a lot. Def take her over the other prof for this course.

While I liked this professor. This was her first semester teaching Financial Accounting II. The material and the structure of this class was very hard to grasp. I felt like being in class I didn't learn so much. Best to learn at home and skip her lectures. The homework's/in class exercises were ALOT so be sure to not procrastinate.

Kind of confused why her ratings are so high? The class itself is easy because of the amount of assignments and extra credit given. However, if you want to actually learn something I would not recommend because she is hard to understand and doesn't explain things well. Such a sweet Professor but I just didn't enjoy how she taught Accounting.

I didnt have to put much effort in to pass the class. I just did all of the assignments and homework. She gives plenty of resources to study for the tests. She will extend assignments if a decent concern is given. She practically explains how to do projects and homework if people say they dont understand. Very lenient and an amazing professor
Sweetest lady ever. Will help you if you need it anytime. Easy class.

Hong is my FAVORITE professor at KSU. She is funny, sweet and very caring about her students. She wants you to succeed and is always available for help. The book was not used much and there was a quickbooks project. I learned so much in her class with her teaching methods. I had her for on campus class and then an online class. both were awesome!

she is so sweet and cares about her students. Tries to remember everyone by name. The tests are so hard, BUTTTT if you do the connect practice tests that she assigns before the test, you'll definitly make an A. The test is just like the practice test but with different numbes but the same concepts. online tests used Tegrity.

I took Qu Hong for ACCT 2100 and she was great. There were lots of assignments every week but if you completed them (they did not take very long), you were in good shape. If the class felt like an assignment due date needed to be moved, she would help us out and move that date to better suit everyone. Some online tests, Tegrity was used.

I love Hong Qu. She is a very sweet professor and cares about her students, very understanding if you ever need to talk to her about your grade. She tries her best to get you to understand the material, tests are very similar to the practice test so you would be smart to do them a couple of times. Also gives in class extra credit opportunities
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Accounting isnt my specailty by any means however she made everything easy to understand and was always willing to help. Responds to emails super fast, there are 3 test and a final none of which are that hard... attendance isnt mandatory however there are in class assignments. Was very transparent with the covid situation and told us straight up

Prof Qu is awesome. i really enjoyed her as a professor, and person. she brings a level of care to teaching that A LOT OF PROFESSORS ARE MISSING!!! seriously take some notes from her. the class is not easy by any means but she helps to make it manageable without holding your hand. there is a lot of homework, but it is functional.

Great professor. Easy semester long 2 person project (no presentation). Very willing to help and answer questions. Take her practice exams on d2l over & over and you'll do great on the actual exam. I would definitely take her again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects
